articles.title: Cricket great exposes Australia Day furore
articles.description: Australia’s first Indigenous male cricketer Jason Gillespie has voiced public support for the Australia Day public holiday to be moved to a new date.
articles.content:

articles.author: Paul Kennedy
articles.title: Bradman and Tendulkar documentary — inside the search to find out what made two of cricket's greatest click
articles.description: In the hunt to find out what made Sir Donald Bradman and Sachin Tendulkar click, the similarities between the two became overwhelmingly apparent, writes Paul Kennedy.
articles.content:
My memories of watching Test cricket go back to the early eighties so that will tell you how many batters I've seen, and Sachin Tendulkar is the best.
